title: incorrect username or password logging in
body: i just logged into my account to post this but my client is telling me username or password is incorrect and i can't log into the game

replies.body:
Its the same here, everytime someone tries to recover my account (that i didnt order) to retrive account name or a password reset, then i cant login.

Fix: Recover and change your password by yourself, dont use the link you didnt order, then you can login again, happend allmost every day to me atm.
just keep checking the status of the server or trying to log in it will get fix eventually

It looks like our authentication servers are having a bit of a hard time today, they must miss their mummy =(.

We're working on getting those login servers back up as soon as possible, but be sure to check the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates!
yeah they said the client is down now
its not letting me LOG IN as well can anyone help?
